data.title: Abbott Offers Fixes To Clear $25B St. Jude Deal In EU
data.meta_description: Abbott Laboratories has offered remedies to alleviate concerns that its $25 billion cash-and-stock acquisition of medical device maker St. Jude Medical will harm competition in the European Union, according to a filing submitted to the EU's antitrust watchdog.
